data:
1Which of the following jobs do you think is the most challenging, doctor, policemen, or government official?
来源：2012年北美真题
来源：2012年北美真题
分类：Society
思路讲解
展开
The school announces that it is a planning to expand the school library. It plans to do so by turning the student center near the library into a new section of the library. The school hopes this will allow more book shelves or multimedia facilities to be installed as well as allowing more students to study in the library. In the conversation, the boy strongly opposes this plan and gives two reasons.
收起
范文
